manifest.name: SubMaker - Subtitle Translator

validation.mainProviderGeminiMissing: Gemini API key and model are required for the main provider
validation.mainProviderConfigured: API key, model, and enabled status are required for main provider '{provider}'
validation.secondaryMissing: Secondary provider must be selected when enabled
validation.secondaryDifferent: Secondary provider must be different from main provider
validation.secondaryGemini: Gemini API key and model are required for the secondary provider
validation.secondaryConfigured: API key, model, and enabled status are required for secondary provider '{provider}'
validation.atLeastOneProvider: At least one AI provider must be enabled with an API key and model
validation.secondaryTwoProviders: Secondary Provider requires two configured AI providers with API keys
validation.noTranslationMissing: At least one no-translation language must be selected
validation.sourceMissing: At least one source language must be selected
validation.targetMissing: At least one target language must be selected
validation.targetLimit: Maximum of {limit} total target languages allowed (including Learn Mode)
validation.learnTargetMissing: Learn Mode requires at least one target language
validation.sessionTokenError: Configuration Error: Session token not found or expired. Please reconfigure the addon to continue using it.

subtitle.loadingBody: Click to reload. Partial results will appear as they are ready.
subtitle.loadingTail: Reload this subtitle later to get more
subtitle.sessionErrorBody: Your session token was not found or has expired.
subtitle.sessionErrorAdvice: Please reconfig and reinstall the addon.
subtitle.sessionErrorQuickFix: Quick fix: Open this link to reinstall with fresh config:
subtitle.sessionErrorToken: A fresh config was created. Use this token to reinstall:
subtitle.sessionErrorFooter: Something is wrong or an update broke your SubMaker config. Sorry! Please reconfig and reinstall the addon.
subtitle.osAuthFailBody: Please fix your username/password in addon config
subtitle.osQuotaBody: You have downloaded the allowed 20 subtitles in the last 24 hours. Wait until UTC midnight (00:00) or change to V3 on config page.
subtitle.osAuthMissingBody: Add your OpenSubtitles username/password in the addon config or switch to V3 (no login needed).
subtitle.osV3RateBody: Too many requests to the V3 service. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
subtitle.osV3UnavailableBody: Service temporarily unavailable. Try again in a few minutes.
subtitle.concurrencyLimitTitle: Too many concurrent translations for this user (limit: {limit}).
subtitle.concurrencyLimitBody: Please wait for one to finish, then try again.
subtitle.translationUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred during translation.
subtitle.translationRetry: An unexpected error occurred.\nClick this subtitle again to retry translation.
subtitle.translationAuthBody: Your Gemini API key is invalid or rejected.\nPlease check that your API key is correct.
subtitle.translationAuthRetry: Update your Gemini API key in the addon configuration,\nthen reinstall the addon and try again.
subtitle.translationOverloadBody: The Gemini API is temporarily overloaded with requests.\nThis is usually temporary and resolves within minutes.
subtitle.translationOverloadRetry: (503) Service Unavailable - Wait a moment for Gemini to recover,\nthen click this subtitle again to retry translation.
subtitle.translationRateLimitBody: Your Gemini API usage limit has been exceeded.\nThis may be a rate limit or quota limit.
subtitle.translationRateLimitRetry: (429) API Rate/Quota Limit - Gemini API is limiting your API key requests.\nWait a few minutes, then click again to retry.
subtitle.translationTooLargeBody: The subtitle file is too large for a single translation.\nThe system attempted chunking but still exceeded limits.
subtitle.translationTooLargeRetry: (MAX_TOKENS) Try translating a different subtitle file.\nAnother model may help. Please let us know if this persists.
subtitle.translationFilteredBody: The subtitle content was blocked by safety filters.\nThis is rare and usually a false positive.
subtitle.translationFilteredRetry: (PROHIBITED_CONTENT) Subtitle content was filtered by Gemini.\nPlease retry, or try a different subtitle from the list.
subtitle.translationInvalidSourceBody: The source subtitle file appears corrupted or invalid.\nIt may be too small or have formatting issues.
subtitle.translationInvalidSourceRetry: (CORRUPT_SOURCE) Please retry or try a different subtitle from the list.
subtitle.translationMultiProvider: Both the main and secondary providers failed to translate this batch.

status.waitingStream: Waiting for a linked stream before loading subtitles.
status.none: No subtitles available for this stream yet.

config.uiLanguageDescription: Applies to all SubMaker pages and subtitles
